response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an absolute treasure for you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This price encapsulates its true worth and provides you with a significant advantage over the market value. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
